issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Actual behavior
When the Debugger is invoked, the builds start, the app goes on and the Titanium studio report an error (image attached)

h3. Expected behavior
Run the debugger without problems

h3. Notes
I use the 2.2 google API android SDK I don't be able to reproduce with 2.2

h3. Steps to reproduce the bug
1. Create a new android project
2. Invoque the debugger
3. App goes up
4. Debugger throws an error
fields.summary: Android: Debugger on windows 7 throw an error
fields.environment:
Titanium studio: 1.0.7.201112281340
Android: 2.2 google API
Host OS: Windows 7 enterprise 32 bits, Service pack 1
Titanium SDK: 1.7.5

comments.body: Closing ticket as the information that was requested was never provided.
